abstract.t: This document presents a transport protocol-Labelcast, especially for IPTV data transmission. Labelcast has the functions of point-to- multipoint distribution and video quality monitoring. This document describes why Labelcast protocol is needed in IPTV service. The header format is defined, and the processing requirements of the protocol are specified. Impact on protocol stack is considered in this document Labelcast is a protocol intended for IPTV data distribution and can be deployed in an incremental manner.
